remarks: Existence form of ~ infxpenc .  A "uniform" or "canonical" version of ~ infxpen , asserting the existence of a single function ` g ` that simultaneously demonstrates product idempotence of all ordinals below a given bound.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.)
statement:
infxpenc2 $p |- ( A e. On -> E. g A. b e. A ( _om C_ b -> ( g ` b ) : ( b X. b ) -1-1-onto-> b ) ) $.
$d A b g $.
